docs.summary:
The wix-billing-backend module contains functionality for working with
 billing features, such as [price quotes](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-price-quotes-creating-and-sending-price-quotes-to-clients) and
[invoices](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-wix-invoices).
description: Wix Billing allows you to manage billing of your customers. You can create and manage invoices and price quotes.
With the Billing APIs, you can:
- Trigger responses to price quote events.
To use the Billing APIs, import `wixBillingBackend` from the `wix-billing-backend` module:
Invoices is an online payment request system and not an accounting service.
You should set up a payment method to handle customer payment.
- **Events**: you can write Wix Billing event handlers for your site's backend. These are used to trigger custom responses to billing-related events.
Event handler functions receive data that corresponds to the event that occurred, for example, when an invoice is created.

docs.summary:
The wix-billing-backend module contains functionality for working with
 [your site's invoices](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-wix-invoices)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Invoices API, import `{invoices}` from the `wix-billing-backend` module:
